title: Textile, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed with additional colors applied by brush on a plain weave foundation
dimensions:
H x W: 40 x 24.4 cm (15 3/4 x 9 5/8 in.)
Repeat H: 22.9 cm (9 in.)
description: Clusters of naturalistic flowers in blue and white, pink and red, surrounded by green leaves with yellow veining on a dark brown ground.
